body_html:
Ah I see, sorry for the confusion. I was thinking about the other one all the time.

From my understanding, AlgorithmConfig is the one users send to the DNN library (e.g. ThenConvolveWithAlgorithm), and AlgorithmDesc is the one DNN sends to the user (e.g. GetConvolveAlgorithms), so AlgorithmDesc is a better place for describing "The scratch size required by an algorithm".

It's also implementable in cuDNN (cudnnGetConvolutionForwardWorkspaceSize), and I think we should implement that too, maybe in a separate commit.
